title: So far this Harrowing is a disappointment....

replies.body:
Those skins are hilariously bad

Best one is Nunu but it's boring as fuck

Jinx doesn't even look like she has anything to do with the Harrowing. Might as well be called Junkyard Jinx

Pantheon looks like Singed, just wtf...

I assume they were going for Zombie Apocalypse Survivor with Jinx.

Not sure if they really succeeded, but it's the only one of the skins I actually like this Harrowing.

Still prefer Firecracker Jinx, though.

That's what they are going with on both pantheon and jinxed. Though I feel pantheon looks more like someone from the Warriors then a zombie survivor and jinx looks more like a post-apocalyptic punk girl than a zombie slayer. She reminds me of like Tank Girl.

> [{quoted}](name=Auryiel,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UcUg82JG,comment-id=001b,timestamp=2015-10-13T22:56:53.200+0000)
> 
> Jinx doesn't even look like she has anything to do with the Harrowing. Might as well be called Junkyard Jinx
> 

I secretly call her Vi Jinx..
Glad I'm not the only one to think Panth looked like Singed.
Apparently, they still think that the Zombie fad is cool. They must watch Walking Dead. So over it.

This, im honestly sick of zombie shit. It needs to die out and never return. So old
But isn't that kinda what zombies do?  Die off and then come back?

Well to be fair & realistic, the vampires, witches, & ghosts thing is 1000x older.

After this harrowing they will have only 3 zombie skins, pretty reasonable considering how many skins are available.
Nunu, Brand and which is the other one?

> [{quoted}](name=Tails Doll,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UcUg82JG,comment-id=0002000100010000,timestamp=2015-10-14T00:50:46.303+0000)
>
> Nunu, Brand and which is the other one?

Ryze
It's gotten really old recently.

nunu is good.
But jinx? The skin is not that great and I didn't even notice it's harrowing skin at the first glance.

I prefer this

http://iorlvm.deviantart.com/art/LOL-Miss-Fortune-Halloween-488417516?q=favby%3AAdonna24%2F49956306&qo=310
This has been brought up every year for the past three years. And still nothing.

> [{quoted}](name=Retillin,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UcUg82JG,comment-id=000d0002,timestamp=2015-10-14T01:32:23.403+0000)
>

rito clearly doesn't know which skin will sell well
I like what looks like a Wobbuffet in the background on the right there.

> [{quoted}](name=MrSlowDie,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UcUg82JG,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2015-10-13T22:08:57.604+0000)

> But jinx? The skin is not that great and I didn't even notice it's harrowing skin at the first glance.

> I prefer this
> 
> http://iorlvm.deviantart.com/art/LOL-Miss-Fortune-Halloween-488417516?q=favby%3AAdonna24%2F49956306&qo=310

such a great skin. Im fine with zombie nunu because I find it haloween even though I find Nunu boring as...watching paint dry or a wet noodle.

Slayer Jinx and Slayer pantheon..I honestly don't understand what is Slayer...Do they carry garlic, a wooden stake. A cross...does someone have a chainsaw arm..no but we got a chainsaw spear? We have Jinx wearing a Punk-biker outfit? and Pantheon wearing a mad max/Fist of the north star apocalyptic Pantheon with a helmet/Singed's backpack? and a chain saw spear. Do the skins look bad no. They don't but only Nunu imo even seems harrowing even though im not impressed because...its just Nunu...he just runs around slapping shit, spitting out balls of etc and standing in 1 spot ulting.

Hey guys, 

Just wanted to pop in here quick - 

As [we've mentioned](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/vg5QEGPB-pbe-bugs-feedback-thread-slayer-pantheon?comment=00010000) in one of the PBE posts, we're doing things a bit differently this year. We'll be posting an announcement soon that should clear up some things. :]

Agreed. The whole, entire appeal of the Harrowing was that it's unique to League and the Shadow Isles and now you guys have pretty much ruined this one for me. Of all the awesome community ideas such as Ectoplasm Zac, Trick or Treat Bard and Necromancer Azir, these are what we get. Total letdown.

Each year, the thematic has been different, and not always tied to the Shadow Isles - last year was heavily influenced the Shadow Isles. 

I do think there are some awesome community concepts that are out there, and we actually keep a folder of great player ideas! Keep in mind that just because something hasn't happened, doesn't mean that it couldn't happen in the future. :]

Respect for coming in here. It can't be easy to face comments like these on something you worked hard on. If the skins weren't priced at 1350 I'd be a lot more understanding. Riot has made statements on how they determine a skin's price, but sometimes it seems like a skin goes completely contrary to what's been said. To compare, Headhunter Caitlyn seems on par with this skin and it's only 975; and there are many others. If there's something more complicated that we as the customer don't see, I'd like to know what it is.

Thanks! I don't mind having these conversations, as it's great to hear first impressions and constructive feedback, whether it be positive or negative. We're always looking for ways to improve upcoming content. 

As Jakra mentioned below, Slayer Pantheon is 975 RP. 

When looking at pricing a skin, we take things on a case by case basis. We don't have a checklist for what needs to go into a 975 RP, for example. We ideate on a thematic and execute on it. During development we have several conversations on what particles, sounds, animations etc. are needed to fulfill x thematic. 

For some thematics, we completely change the weapon, which may warrant new sounds and particles. for other skins such as Arclight Vayne, the weapon doesn't change, so we won't need new sounds, but giving it new particles really ups the Arclight thematic. 

Let's take Zombie Nunu as an example. He has different VO for this particular skin, but he's not a legendary. Historically, legendary skins have VO. So why is he priced at 1350 RP? We felt that the new VO wasn't a completely new VO script (something like PROJECT: Yi has), which is why we didn't deem it legendary status. 

Hope this clears a few things up!

I think the biggest problem for me is that these skins really do seem like they could have come out at any time in the year. There's nothing particularly Halloween oriented about them.

Don't get me wrong, I like the screenshots of the Jinx and Pantheon skins, but Demon Vi and Spirit Fire Brand feel far, *far* more appropriate for the Harrowing than what's on the PBE right now, so much so that it almost feels like someone messed up on the release timeline.

In other words, with love from Riot of course,
We are sorry you don't like the skins. But we do so we're gonna go ahead and ship them anyway.

Way to respond to overwhelming feedback. GG.

I've been keeping track of feedback on several social media platforms, not just the boards. 

**TL;DR**, I've found that the issue lies with the different thematic than other years, and the lack of messaging. (We're posting more info about this really soon, which should clarify some things!) In addition Jinx, Pantheon and Nunu mains are pretty excited for these skins.

A few things:
1) Who cares what the mains think.  I main Nocturne and would be happy with literally any skin for him.
2) You said these skins will not be legacy, meaning they realistically could have been released any time.  So why didn't you try real hard making skins people that DON'T main the champs the skins are of would want to buy just for the quality/limitations on purchases after The Harrowing ends?
3) I agree there is positive feedback, but everywhere from lolgen to reddit to s@20 has more detractors than promoters.

But it's too late apparently, you will just release these and following the trend of no more harrowing map then no more limited skins, I'm sure next year we will just not have a harrowing

The thing I¬¥m disappointed about isn¬¥t the quality/theme of the skins.

It¬¥s that there¬¥s 99% no lore involved in them. And the 1% that IS there, is from the Walking Dead.
Those skins just aren¬¥t skins from runeterra. They are a homage to a fairly popular Tv-series.
Generally speaking, most skins aren't tied to lore. By not connecting skins to lore, we're not as limited with skin options.

When are you finally going to release a new Cassiopeia skin? Didn't you mention her as a possible candidate for the Harrowing the last time we talked?

Jinx', Pantheon's and Nunu's latest skins were all released way after Jade Fang Cass, meanwhile she's been waiting for 32 months now. Also why  is Jinx getting TWO skins this year?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UcUg82JG,comment-id=002300040000,timestamp=2015-10-14T00:21:44.986+0000)
>
> Each year, the thematic has been different, and not always tied to the Shadow Isles - last year was heavily influenced the Shadow Isles. 
> 
> I do think there are some awesome community concepts that are out there, and we actually keep a folder of great player ideas! Keep in mind that just because something hasn't happened, doesn't mean that it couldn't happen in the future. :]

When is Cassiopeia getting a new skin.........

It's been ages, earlier in the year someone hinted she may have been getting a Harrowing skin....now that is obviously not the case. She hasn't gotten anything nice since her rework...and that wasn't really nice.
As a counterpoint, everyone and their mother has created a zombie game, or something zombie related. I'd like something vaguely unique, please.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UcUg82JG,comment-id=0023,timestamp=2015-10-14T00:06:10.102+0000)
>
> Hey guys, 
> 
> Just wanted to pop in here quick - 
> 
> As [we've mentioned](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/vg5QEGPB-pbe-bugs-feedback-thread-slayer-pantheon?comment=00010000) in one of the PBE posts, we're doing things a bit differently this year. We'll be posting an announcement soon that should clear up some things. :]

Honestly as someone who has never played jinx, [this one ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/dgtRLkxJ-possible-future-jinx-skin) seems way cooler and fits better with Jinx's playful "get exicted" theme. Which brings me to my thought on a zombie apocalypse theme:

It isn't fun. It's apocalyptic, grim, and honestly just so overdone at this point that I'd rather butchers bridge came back for a week. 

Halloween is scary fun. Zombies lost their luster back in Black Ops Zombies like two years ago.  A zombie week loses the playful happiness halloween is supposed to have, that the jinx skin I linked has.  

Tl;dr: TWD has ruined zombies imo.
I don't know man, Shaun of the Dead was hilarious.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UcUg82JG,comment-id=0023,timestamp=2015-10-14T00:06:10.102+0000)

We'll be posting an announcement soon that should clear up some things. :]

Literally the most vague and disappointing thing I've ever heard. Still doesn't cover the fact that these are nowhere close to Harrowing/Halloween-esque skins.

> [{quoted}](name=Blainezy,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UcUg82JG,comment-id=0023000a,timestamp=2015-10-14T01:59:31.177+0000)
>
> Literally the most vague and disappointing thing I've ever heard. Still doesn't cover the fact that these are nowhere close to Harrowing/Halloween-esque skins.

Dude. What part of "Zombie not Shadow-Isle-y" do you not understand?
He's not saying that they are not shadow isles like, he simply feels they aren't fitting for Halloween not necessarily shadow isles but things like costumes jack o lanterns and things overall spooky
Sorry for being vague here - the post will cover what I can't at the moment. I don't want to misspeak on behalf of the team. The announcement should be up super soon.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UcUg82JG,comment-id=0023000a0001,timestamp=2015-10-14T19:56:09.891+0000)

Well thank you very much KateyKhaos! You da best!
:] Here's a [bit more info](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/Grefbrd1-a-note-about-the-harrowing) (the post I was mentioning earlier).

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UcUg82JG,comment-id=0023000a000100000000,timestamp=2015-10-14T22:02:10.200+0000)
>
> :] Here's a [bit more info](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/Grefbrd1-a-note-about-the-harrowing) (the post I was mentioning earlier).

And I was so looking forward to the Harrowing this year... until this of course. I was looking forward to a resolution to the Bilgewater arc, what with it in utter chaos, Gangplank dethroned, no clear ruler, and the Shadow Isles ready to strike at any time... I suppose I got spoiled the year of Headless Hecarim and all the other Harrowing skins... Everything since has seemed really underwhelming, this year especially.
As a side note, I personally think that those skins are pretty cool, just out of place for the Harrowing.

You can totally count me in on terms of the jinx skin, I think it looks great, particularly the chompers, had a good chuckle looking at it. But I don't think they fit to well, besides that, I was REALLY, (I deliberately went out of my way to feed my wallet for it in a time when i probably shouldn't have) Hyped for the chance of a Harrowing bard and azir set. 

This is probably the biggest disappointment to me since the untimely death of our lord and savior Urf, at the hands of the evil Weedwick. Like...... F&*^ man. I've got 6 fully stacked tears in my inventory. Amumu, doesnt know my sorrow!

No Harrowing Map again this year? :/ I thought the reasoning for not doing a map was because of the map update... years later, we still have nothing again. It's kind of discouraging that during season 1-2 you guys could do it with such a limited budget / team, but you can't do it now as a million dollar company.

I would have liked to have seen a Trick or Treat Bard skin. I do not like the Pantheon skin that much. The Jinx skin is alright. The Nunu skins is really good. It would have been better to have the Nunu skin with two other Halloween/Shadow Isles skin. The slayer skins don't really look Halloweenish to me.

Zombies I can understand. Zombie Brand was fantastic, and Nunu is no exception.

HOWEVER, if Jinx and Panth are supposed to be 'zombie slayers' they look more like they belong in a Fallout game, not a zombie apocalypse.

The slayer skins are really bad. They look more like Mad Max then Halloween. And Jinx already has a semi-dystopian vibe so her skin added nothing new. 

Very disappointing this year.

So when the Harrowing comes and Bilgewater is still in civil war and unrest, we're going to get...

Zombie Nunu and Pantheon/Jinx teaming up to slay zombies.

Zombies.

Letting that sink in for a moment.

Sorry Riot, as much as I love zombies, (I don't), it just doesn't live up to the hype and excitement for the Harrowing. I get that you don't want to introduce skins in a continuity, but alt universe Pantheon who goes zombie slaying instead of proving the art of war just feels incredibly dissatisfying next to stories about how Nautilus stood strong against the Shadow Isles' armies and forced them in two.

One could fit into official lore, the other honestly just feels like fanfiction. TWD meets League fanfiction. And I'm not that interested.

Hope they'll somehow make it exciting even if the skins presented in the PBE are incredibly dull.

Last year's Harrowing skins was amazing: Underworld Wukong, Ravenborn LeBlanc and Reaper Soraka. This year is pretty lackluster with one that's obviously Harrowing-like, Zombie Nunu, but the others doesn't fit. They look like something that came out of Mad Max/Borderlands. Nothing remotely  look Harrowing other than Jinx's recall. 

Even Demon Vi and Voodoo Brand skins look more like it belong to the Harrowing event than "Slayers".
I'm sorry, but how are these skins any less "Halloween-y" than say Mundo Mundo, or Kitty Cat Katarina? I love the animations and the old 80's horror movie vibe they bring.

Slayer Panth and Slayer Jinx look more like Mad Max or general post-apocalyptic survivor skins than anything to do with Halloween. Mundo Mundo and Kitty Cat Katarina both play on the real world Halloween costume industry, while more recent skins have tended towards Shadow Isles/Harrowing instead of Halloween type stuff. Just because surviving the zombie apocalypse might be scary, doesn't mean it's related to Halloween.

Zombie Nunu is quite nice, and does match with old "mad scientist" horror, as well as theming with Zombie Brand. Which "old 80's horror movie" has stuff like Slayer Panth and Slayer Jinx?
